Posts.Content: Dec 10, 2013 09:52AM doozyann wrote: Im new to this and am sitting here crying.  I feel like I will never get my 2nd drain out.  My bilateral mastectomy was 6 weeks ago today followed by another surgery 2 days later to remove a hematoma and cauterize bleeding.  Have had 3 fills of the expanders and went a bit more than comfortable because the plastic surgeon said the more I could tolerate the drain output would lessen.  Well my drain went from 30-45 to 60-70.  Im not happy.   This is my second diagnosis at 45 with my first being at 25.

Posts.Content: Dec 14, 2013 01:42PM doozyann wrote: Hello Ladies...  I'm 6-1/2 weeks post op and STILL HAVE A DRAIN!!!  The PS said if I could tolerate more injected into the TE it would lessen the drain output.  So he recommended 60 on that side and I went to 80.  Uncomfortable, but small price to pay to get rid of Jack (my nickname for the drain).  Two days later my drain output doubled and hasn't slowed since... its been a week.  Had some redness low grade fever, doc though the TE was infected and put me on antibiotics and said to come back in 2 days (after sitting in waiting room for 2-1/2 hours)  Another doc in hospital looked also and thinks its a yeast or fungal topical skin infection.  I cant take anymore.   My PS always tells me the worse possible scenario...  I was convinced I would be in surgery again by today to remove.  Now we just wait. Beyond frustrated... he said I cant drive til drain is out... I feel so trapped and needy and depressed.  Two teenagers and single mom with no man in my life.  Anyway... should be fun dating after this :(  My family is hosting a Christmas Party in a few hours and usually asks for donations for the local food bank.... They have changed the deal this year and have asked to help me with donations so I can pay my bills.   Been off work 7 weeks with no disability check as of today.  NYS likes to take its time.  Its a small fraction of my pay but its something.  So I guess I better go stand in front of my closet and figure out what I can wear to hide my lack of chest and my friend Jack :(  I'm blessed but I'm pissed.  Bad day for everyone to be looking at me...
